EmailTemplate.name: Reactivation Campaign Q417.Reactivation_Email_3
EmailTemplate.subject: To subscribe or unsubscribe...that is the question
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, We understand that you’re busy, so we don’t want to clutter your inbox with unwanted email.
We’re reaching out one last time to see if you want to continue receiving information about our eBooks, white papers, webinars, and events. Just click one of the links below and you’re done!
KEEP THE EMAILS COMING <[[https://content.pivotal.io/welcome-back?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=reactivation-three-2018]]>
I WOULD LIKE TO UNSUBSCRIBE <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/UnsubscribePage.html?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=reactivation-three-2018]]>
Thanks, The Pivotal Team
